description: A quick, practical guide to The Halo Effect.

buildup.text: One positive trait spills over and colors our entire perception of a person or brand.

discovery.text: Apple's sleek design makes people assume its software is also superior. That's the halo.

twist.text: The reverse exists too. One bad experience poisons everythingâ€”the horn effect.

climax.text: Brands invest millions in design because aesthetics create a halo over the whole product.
